ValidationRule.description: This validation rule prevent from changing the status to Confirmed or In Development without completing the Type, Assigned To or Data Fix
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISCHANGED(Status__c) && (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Confirmed")||ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "In Development"))
&&
(ISBLANK(Assigned_To__c)|| ISPICKVAL(Type__c, ""))
&&
$Profile.Name = "Systems Administrator"
&&
RecordType.Name <> 'User Account Request'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When changing the status to "Confirmed" or "In Development", the "Assigned To" and "Type" cannot be blank.
